title: How to Brew Xi Hu Long Jing Green Tea

steps.headline: Rinse teacup and teapot with hot water.
Use about 3.5 - 7 grams of tea leaves (2-3.5 teaspoons) for every 225 ml of water.
Steep tea leaves in hot water at 70°c (158°F) to 80°c (176°F) for 1 minute for the first and second brewing.
Gradually increase steeping time and temperature for subsequent brewing.
Refill when glass is still 1/3 full.

text: Rinse teacup and teapot with hot water.  Use about 3.5 - 7 grams of tea leaves (2-3.5 teaspoons) for every 225 ml of water.  Steep tea leaves in hot water at 70°c (158°F) to 80°c (176°F) for 1 minute for the first and second brewing.  Gradually increase steeping time and temperature for subsequent brewing.  Refill when glass is still 1/3 full.  Finished.
